comment.author: 69363849@N00
comment._content: It actually looks like had a rather unremarkable career: www.baseball-reference.com/t/thomair01.shtml

comment.author: 20293706@N06
comment._content: during the great influenza pandemic of 1918 that killed between 50 - 100 million people worldwide, and that decimated the city of Philadelphia, this guy and his wife drove sick people to the hospital at grave risk to themselves -- they did this when most other people were too scared to come out of their homes.  he is a hero.  for real.
